data.quote: Man, I'm pretty!
Enough about you, let's talk about me!
I don’t need to date, I just need a mirror.
Hey, baby! Are you wearing space pants? 'Cause your legs are out of this world!
You know, when you really think about it, beauty is only skin deep. But I'm pretty all the way to the bone!
Dee Dee, get out of my laboratory!
Science is the greatest thing in the universe!
This is science, Dee Dee, you wouldn’t understand!
I am not a child, I am a scientist!
Only those with superior minds are worthy of my time!
Dee Dee, you are just a disruption to science!
Ah, science... so pure, so perfect.
You have failed to understand the mind of a genius!
The things I do for love!
Oh, why me?!
I just know something bad is going to happen.
This is just too scary!
I have to save Muriel!
Eustace, be nice!
I’m not brave, I’m scared all the time!
It's a spooky nightmare!
I may be scared, but I’ll protect my family!
We’re not just girls—we’re superheroes!
Brains and bravery make the perfect combo!
We’ve got to use our powers for good!
Being a leader means making tough choices.
I believe we can make a difference, one fight at a time.
With teamwork, we’re unstoppable!
I’ll protect this city with everything I’ve got.
When things get tough, we fight even harder!
Never underestimate the power of kindness.
We’re here to save the day, no matter the odds!
I'm not as tough as Blossom, but I can be brave too!
Sometimes, kindness is the strongest superpower of all!
Just because I'm cute doesn't mean I can't fight!
Butter toast! It solves everything!
Gravy is my favorite color!
I am a woodpecker! Except with dirt!
I'm a monster with a heart of bacon!
Hey, can I eat that shoe?
My brain went on vacation, but my stomach stayed!
I once had a dream where everything was gravy!
Organization is the backbone of success!
This calls for some scientific investigation!
Knowledge is power, gentlemen!
Remember, cleanliness is next to Edliness.
I’d prefer to avoid any confrontation, if possible.
Science never rests, and neither do I!
I've got a plan that will make us rich! Just follow my lead!
You guys are missing out on the good life—it's all about the hustle!
Why work hard when you can work smart? Let’s find the easy way!
I’m not just a kid; I’m a businessman in the making!
If you want something, you gotta go out and get it—no one’s giving it away!
With great power comes great responsibility. It's up to me to make the right choices.
I may be a kid, but I can take on anything the universe throws at me!
Every alien has its strengths; I just have to find the right one for the job!
Being a hero isn't just about the powers; it's about helping people when they need it.
Adventure time! Let's go explore the world and make some awesome memories!
Sometimes, you just have to believe in yourself and trust that you can do anything.
No matter how tough things get, I won't give up on my friends or my adventures!
It's not about how many battles I win, but the friends I make along the way.
Life is short, so let's stretch it out and enjoy every moment!
If you don't have fun, you're doing it wrong!
I can shapeshift into anything! But I prefer being myself, you know?
Life is just a game, and I'm the dealer of doom!
Why worry about the afterlife when we can have fun in the here and now?
Death is not the end; it's just the beginning of a new adventure!
Being grim is my job, but I can't help but find the humor in it!
